item.title: Report X-2023090408
item.description:
Report X-2023090408

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-03
  • City: NORTHAMPTON
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found the damaged hazmat in a red hazardous tote on the Hazmat pallet in QA, grabbed my PPE to inspect the pail. DescribePack: There is a dent on the body of the pail at the top near the removable lid. There is some yellow paint on the pail over the wrap and under the wrap. The paint over the wrap had dried up and stiffened. The paint underneath the wrap is still wet. DurationRel: 24 and MitigateEffect: Kept upright, placed in red hazardous tote and was brought to QA to be inspected.

item.title: Report X-2023090232
item.description:
Report X-2023090232

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-08
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO UNLOAD WEARING FULL PPE AND FOUND BOX WITH UPPER CORNER WET WITH FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3 LABEL. RESPONDER USED DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET FOR A FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3 PACKAGE. NO LIQUID FROM PACKAGE ON FLOOR TO CLEAN UP, TRANSPORTED PACKAGE TO DMP AREA. RESPONDER REFERRED TO THE WASTE DISPOSAL CHART PRIOR TO PROCESSING THE DAMAGE THROUGH THE DMP.

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: ZELIENOPLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: load side manage called there was a leaking hazmat. QA came and cleaned up the spill and put the damaged package in a tote and put it in the Hazmat cage DescribePack: the side of the plastic jugs side cracked open. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: spill pads were put down and the package was taken to the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023090327
item.description:
Report X-2023090327

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: ZELIENOPLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This hazmat was damaged during the unload process. It was placed in a plastic lined bin. DescribePack: The package had pressure put on it during the unload process and that caused the bottle to become dented and liquid to come out of the cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic lined hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023090313
item.description:
Report X-2023090313

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: PITTSBURGH
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While unloading package, a package handler dropped the package causing the leak. DescribePack: Damaged cap about the size of a dime. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA obtained a hazmat bin and put the leaking hazmat in the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023090281
item.description:
Report X-2023090281

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: NORTHAMPTON
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found the damaged hazmat in a red hazardous material tote. I grabbed my PPE to inspect the box. DescribePack: There is a big wet spot at the bottom of the package. The jerrican was in a plastic bag with a zip tie. I pulled the jerrican out of the bag and there were at least 2 liters of liquid at the bottom of the bag. I turn the Jerrican upside down to see where the leak was coming from. It leaked out from the cap. The cap was not fully completely secured on the jerrican. DurationRel: 21 and MitigateEffect: kept upright to prevent any more leaks

item.title: Report X-2023090273
item.description:
Report X-2023090273

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: PHILADELPHIA
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The hazmat was found by a QA member on the dock when it was about to be loaded onto the truck. The top of the box was corroding due to one of the bottles tops being loose. The hazmat was put into a bin to stop any leakage and placed into the damage hazmat cage to process. DescribePack: One of the bottles caps were loose and the liquid leaked out on to the top of the box and on the other bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was put into a bin to stop any liquid from spreading and placed into the hazmat cage.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: This hazmat was damaged in the unloading process. The cap was damages causing the liquid to leak out into the package. DescribePack: The cap was damaged therefore causing the leak DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed into a red hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023090259
item.description:
Report X-2023090259

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-27T18:15:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-29
  • City: BREINIGSVILLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was found in the unload loaded on its side. It was discovered leaking in trailer and brought to QA's attention. QA identified the hazardous labeling and placed it in a salvage drum in the Hazmat Cage. DescribePack: One of the gallons in the box had a slightly loose cap with no seal. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was contained and brought to QA in a haz tote and then transferred to a yellow salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2023090458
item.description:
Report X-2023090458

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: CARLISLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND OPEN IN THE DA/OVERGOOD PROCESSING AREA. DURING RETAPE, THE EMPLOYEE NOTICED 9 LITHIUM ION BATTERIES INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE AND THE OUTER PACKAGE HAD NO HAZARDOUS MARKINGS. THE EMPLOYEE CONTACTED THE HAZMAT AUDTOR TO FURTHER INVESTIGATE.
